repository_description: Brief description of the repository's purpose
model_path: Path to the model artifacts in mlflow
model_flavor: Flavor of the model eg sklearn,xgboost,pytorch,tensorflow,onnx
model_author: Author of the model in mlflow, used for authentication
model_input_parameters: Definition of input parameters required by the model
model_output_parameters: Definition of output parameters produced by the model
serve_endpoint_schemas: Request and response schema for the serve REST API
runtime_environment: Environment variables and dependencies for runtime
feature_store: Feature group definitions for the feature store
fastapi_serve_service: Model class definition for the model
api_client: Configuration for external API endpoints that the service interacts with
